name: Twitch Dark Style by Strong_WTF
description:
Version: 1.2 (28.05.2021)

[RU]
Тема Twitch только для тёмного режима под новый дизайн.
Свяжитесь со мной на твиче по нику Strong_WTF в случае обнаружения багов.

[EN]
Twitch theme only for dark mode for a new design.
Contact me in Twitch by the nickname Strong_WTF in case of detection of bugs.
additional_info:
v0.1 - beta
v0.2 - fix colors with raid/host
v0.3 - fix colors viewer card, colors and font in player and other fixes
v0.4 - changing some primary colors
v0.5 - сode optimization and more fixes
v0.6 - сolors fixes
v0.61 - little fixes
v0.65 - fix colors
v0.7 - new dashboard
v0.75 - fix multistream and host colors and other colors
v0.76 - little fix
v0.8 - new channel design
v0.81 - fix colors
v0.9 - fix color sub offer and more fixes
v1.0 - release (fix all possible problems with colors. If you find an error, write)
v1.1 - сomplete design redesign + bug fixes
v1.2 - optimization and rework of the code due to the update of css styles on twitch
